title: Per Capita Personal Consumption Expenditures: Nondurable Goods: Food and Beverages Purchased for Off-Premises Consumption for Massachusetts
notes:
Personal consumption expenditures of a given area divided by the resident population of the area.

Purchases of food and nonalcoholic beverages purchased for off-premises consumption, alcoholic beverages purchased for off-premises consumption, and food produced and consumed on farms.For more information about this release go to http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/regional/pce/pce_newsrelease.htm.
